channel.title: ck on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in ck on funPlantGenes

item.title: GhNAC83
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GlaUn057212 Gene Symbol: GhNAC83 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhNAC83 inhibits corm dormancy release by regulating ABA signaling and cytokinin biosynthesis in Gladiolus hybridus.

item.title: MdCKX5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1021500 Gene Symbol: MdCKX5 Gene Name: CYTOKININ OXIDASE/DEHYDROGENASE5 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: CYTOKININ OXIDASE/DEHYDROGENASE5 (MdCKX5), an age-dependent gene, encodes a functional CKX enzyme and serves as the common downstream target of SQUAMOSA PROMOTER BINDING PROTEIN-LIKE (SPL) transcription factor MdSPL14 and WRKY transcription factor MdWRKY24 to control the degradation of cytokinin (CK).

item.title: MdTCP17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdTCP17 Gene Name: CK-responsive TEOSINTE BRANCHED1, CYCLOIDEA, and PCF17 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A correlation between expression of CK-responsive TEOSINTE BRANCHED1, CYCLOIDEA, and PCF17 (MdTCP17) and AR formation in response to CK was identified, and overexpression of MdTCP17 in transgenic apple inhibited AR formation.

item.title: MdWOX11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdWOX11 Gene Name: WUSCHEL-RELATED HOMEOBOX11 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Cytokinin-responsive MdTCP17 interacts with MdWOX11 to repress adventitious root primordium formation in apple rootstocks.

item.title: MsDREB6.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsDREB6.2 Gene Name: Dehydration-responsive element binding factor 6 Genome: apple sequence database (http://genomics.

item.title: MsGH3.5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsGH3.5 Gene Name: GRETCHEN HAGEN3 Genome: Species: Malus sieversii Functional Descriptions: MsGH3.

item.title: PsBRC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsBRC1 Gene Name: BRANCHED1 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: The effectiveness of SL at affecting bud and branch growth correlated with the ability of SL to regulate expression of PsBRC1.
